00044 typedef enum
00045 {
00047   APS_AUTH_SUCCESS_STATUS           = 0x00,
00050   APS_AUTH_INVALID_PARAMETER_STATUS = 0x01,
00052   APS_AUTH_NO_KEY_STATUS            = 0x02,
00054   APS_AUTH_NO_DATA_STATUS           = 0x03,
00058   APS_AUTH_INVALID_CHALLENGE_STATUS = 0x04,
00062   APS_AUTH_INVALID_MAC_STATUS       = 0x05,
00066   APS_AUTH_INVALID_KEY_STATUS       = 0x06,
00069   APS_AUTH_TIMEOUT_STATUS           = 0x07,

00097   APS_RESPOND_REJECT_ACTION = 0x02

00106 typedef struct
00107 {
00109   struct
00110   {
00111     void *next; 
00112     uint8_t ttl;
00114     NWK_AllocDataReq_t allocNwkDataReq;
00116     SSP_CalculateAuthenticParamsReq_t macTagReq;
00118     NWK_DataReq_t *challengeNwkDataReq;
00119     NWK_DataReq_t *macdataNwkDataReq;
00120     struct 
00121     {
00122       ShortAddr_t shortAddr;
00124       uint8_t macTag[HASH_SIZE];
00126       uint32_t frameCounter;
00127     } partner;
00129     uint8_t responderChallenge[CHALLENGE_SEQUENCE_SIZE];
00130   } service;
00135   ExtAddr_t partnerAddress;
00138   APS_AuthenticateAction_t action;
00140   uint8_t initiatorChallenge[CHALLENGE_SEQUENCE_SIZE];
00142   void (*APS_AuthenticateConf)(APS_AuthenticateConf_t *conf);
00144   APS_AuthenticateConf_t confirm;
00145 } APS_AuthenticateReq_t;
